text: Soni Allah apeleche chilandanyo cha Musi (wa Maaka) wawaliji wantunjelele soni wakutamilichika, lyauichililaga lisiki lyakwe mwawinji kuumila malo galigose, nambo wakaaniile indimba ya Allah, basi Allah ŵaupele kupasya chiwaalo chasala ni woga ligongo lya yaŵaliji (achinsyene musio) ali nkutenda
